item.title: How ‘Fantastic Four’ Writer Eric Pearson Became a Marvel Secret Weapon
item.description: The busy scribe — known for ‘Thor: Ragnarok,’ ‘Black Widow’ and ‘Thunderbolts*’ — recounts secrets from his 15 years in the Marvel Studios family.

item.title: Ranking the MCU: Every Marvel Studios Movie and Show, From Worst to Best
item.description: SPOILER ALERT: This list references major plot developments for basically every project in the MCU, which is available to stream on Disney+. Since 2008, Marvel Studios has released 37 feature films, 1
